commit message: Working on making code more readable

UI cleanup. Changed watchlist to button

Close watchlist when item is clicked
Making a lot of things private variables.

Cleaned up the look of the application, removed watchlist from nav menu, added icons
Fixed watchlist text, Changed watchlist button, adjusted media adapter in thread view for new padding size
Fixed nested threadview watchlist not updating
Fixed rotation boardlist glitch. Fixed crash when returning to threadview
